frontmatter.title: Meshery Ranks 6th Highest-Velocity Project in CNCF, Announces Major Governance Shift
frontmatter.subtitle: Implements a critical revision to its governance and organizational structure
frontmatter.author: The Newsroom
frontmatter.description: Riding top-tier CNCF velocity, Meshery unveils a new, expanded project structure at KubeCon to accelerate its 300+ community-driven integrations.
